name: df-flf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cflf, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, cuni(crn(cfil)), cmpt(s2, co(cuni(cv(s0)), cmap, cuni(cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), cflim, cfv(co(cuni(cv(s0)), cfm, cv(s2)), cv(s1))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ fLimf =(s0 ∈ Top, s1 ∈ ⋃ ran(Fil)↦(s2 ∈(⋃ s0[↦]⋃ s1)↦(s0[fLim]((⋃ s0[FilMap]s2)` s1))))
comment: Define a function that gives the limits of a function ` f ` in the filter sense. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Oct-2009.)
